scripts.init: yarn install && yarn build && yarn generate
scripts.generate: rm -rf generated && yarn generate:tomtom && yarn generate:spi
scripts.generate:tomtom: node node_modules/@redocly/cli/bin/cli.js bundle specs/tomtom-openapi.yaml --output generated/tomtom-openapi.yaml && node node_modules/openapi-typescript-codegen/bin/index.js gen --exportServices false --exportCore false --input generated/tomtom-openapi.yaml --output generated/tomtom
scripts.generate:spi: node node_modules/@redocly/cli/bin/cli.js bundle specs/maps-search-spi.yaml --output generated/maps-search-spi.yaml && node node_modules/openapi-typescript-codegen/bin/index.js gen --exportServices false --exportCore false --input generated/maps-search-spi.yaml --output generated/maps-search
